sect1.title: Changelog
sect1.para: Please note that the changelog only lists which editor was responsible for putting the changes into CVS; please read the Credits page in Chapter 1 for details on who wrote what.

June 3rd, 2003 [tushar]: alsa: updated to 0.9.4 (submitted by James Iwanek).
